description: Refined and handsome like the Diamond Head ridgeline that it's named after, the Lae'ahi Li Kala is an everyday beach sneaker, upgraded. Cushiony comfort and premium suede combine to put a sophisticated spring in your step. Equal parts style and strength, the Lea'ahi Li Kala is the ideal around-town shoe.
name: Olukai LaeAhi Li Kala - Mens
